sentences.cn: 在这次船只沉没事件中他幸免于死.

sentences.en: He walked away from the shipwreck.
sentences.cn: 他船难中平安地脱险了.

sentences.en: He was drowned in a shipwreck off the coast of Spain.
sentences.cn: 他在西班牙海岸附近的一次海难中溺水身亡。

sentences.en: It's a wonder that the boy survived the shipwreck.
sentences.cn: 那船沉没而这孩子竟幸免于难,真是奇迹.

sentences.en: Now I have an artifact from every Florida shipwreck of the 1960's.
sentences.cn: 现在,我拥有60年代的每次在佛罗里达沉船的艺术品的人造品.

sentences.en: Only five of the crew survived the shipwreck.
sentences.cn: 在这次海难中只有五名船员幸免于死.

sentences.en: Only three people were saved from the shipwreck.
sentences.cn: 在这次船失事中只有三人得救.

sentences.en: Ten of them survived the shipwreck.
sentences.cn: 他们中只有十人在船难中幸存.

sentences.en: The boys listened breathlessly as the sailor detailed the story of the shipwreck.
sentences.cn: 水手详述沉船的故事时,孩子们屏息倾听着.

sentences.en: The danger of shipwreck is much greater in dense fog.
sentences.cn: 在浓雾中船只失事的危险要大得多.

sentences.en: The divers plunged into the water in search of the shipwreck.
sentences.cn: (潜水员跳入水中,寻找遇难的船只. )

sentences.en: The shipwreck just breaks the surface of the water.
sentences.cn: 遇难船只的残骸露在水面上.

sentences.en: The whole family perished in a shipwreck.
sentences.cn: 这一家人在一次海难中全部丧生.

sentences.en: They narrowly escaped shipwreck in a storm in the North Sea.
sentences.cn: 他们在北海遇到风暴，船险些失事。

sentences.en: They offered a thanksgiving to God for their escape from the shipwreck.
sentences.cn: 他们因从海难中得以生还向上帝作了感恩祈祷.

trans.tran_cn: 船舶失事，海难，遇难船只，沉船
trans.tran_en: the destruction of a ship in an accident
if someone is shipwrecked, they are in a boat or ship when it is destroyed in an accident
